'''Encyclopedic Knowledge''' is [[Tighnari]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|character=Tighnari|talent=Encyclopedic Knowledge|dead}}
* Only one local specialty will be shown on the mini-map at a time.
* Because they double as a [[Scarab (Wildlife)|Wildlife]], [[Scarab]]s are not generated by the game unless the player is close to their spawning point, making this talent's effect less efficient when searching for Scarabs compared to Local Specialties that are fixed objects.
